revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-MR22U |revision=v1.0 |asin=B018DTWJ26;GB; |est_release_date=12/05/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=3G mobile router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9531;QCA9531-AL3A; |cpu1_cspeed=550 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64FVSIG |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M13S2561616A-5T |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9531;QCA9531-AL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=battery,portable |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |oui=3C:46:D8, 08:57:00 |oui_eth=3C:46:D8, 08:57:00 }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wi-Fi Portable 3G Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com.cn/product_357.html Product page]
Battery: Li-Ion, 3.7V, 5200 mAh
*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_tl-mr22u_1.0 ''TP-Link TL-MR22U'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=58520 ''TP-Link TL-MR22U'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums]
Default device firmware: 3.17.1 Build 140123 Rel.31844n <small> :Default firmware contains backdoor account with username admin and password adminpwd. :Not sure what it is used for since the regular user has only password field on login screen. </small> USB port provides between 0.8A and 1.2A of current :in both charge and power-on modes.
